name: Just Drive (itch)
description:
Just Drive is a narrative driven game with thematic ties to the Movie Drive and the video game Hotline Miami.

This game was thought up one night while lost in the middle of nowhere driving my car. I wanted to capture that feeling and I also wanted to program a fairly realistic car.

The music is all carefully crafted and then run through a physical tape player to produce audio artifacts for a more authentic sound.

All in all, I'm really happy with how it turned out. I hope everyone has a good time with it ^_^

Also check out the site for more info: justdrivegame.tumblr.com

Escape key opens the in-game menu.
